origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'AcademicAPI.fetch_articles', 'description': 'This function fetches academic articles based on the topic, quantity, and date.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'topic', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The topic of the articles.'}, {'name': 'quantity', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The number of articles to fetch.'}, {'name': 'date', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The date criteria for fetching articles, e.g., latest, specific date.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'articles', 'description': 'The list of articles fetched.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 AcademicAPI.fetch_articles, 它的参数输入如下: 'topic'是'risk management', 'quantity'是'4', 'date'是'latest'.
